documents.document: When I used to joke about closing the gates to the US and allowing it to implode on itself, I wasn't serious...
@blisterguy @Telstra I will contact Telstra tomorrow. We are already paying a hideous amount. It might be time to shop around.
@blisterguy @Telstra I don't understand why we should have to pay extra when we were sold that it would be faster. Classic Telstra play.
@wrongwaygoback happy birthday!
@Top8Games do you have a recipe that's a favourite? My cookies always end up to be crumbly and shortbread like :/
@Top8Games they look amazing!
@Top8Games good plan! Go with the white ones if you can, they have a sweeter taste usually and defrost a little easier while floating.
@Top8Games try throwing them into some white wine or cider, that's if you like that kind of thing.
@amandathegreat we saw it for the second time yesterday and AQ was belting out all of the songs in the middle of the cinema.
@blisterguy this is what you were doing when I left you with the kid??
@wrongwaygoback my god that looks amazing!
@Top8Games zesting and making limoncello seems a tastier treat than tomato sauce ;p
@wrongwaygoback awww that's adorable!
@blisterguy @Top8Games seriously BDM, Ray does not need more bad food encouragement in his current diet.
@wrongwaygoback well cmon, he needs a bit of comfort in his life. Do you expect him to lay on the ground like some common house pet?
@wrongwaygoback it's just 4 years right? How bad can it be ðŸ˜¬ðŸ˜©
@wrongwaygoback those boys of yours are hilarious.
@amandathegreat you would like a copy?
@amandathegreat spores. Ventilate as much as possible, fresh air helps, but difficult if there is no window. I have info we give tenants if
@amandathegreat is it just in the bathroom? Clean it with a cleaning white vinegar mixed with warm water. It's the only thing that kills the
@Telstra, seriously?! Again?! Some of us actually need to try and work. How about I start charging you for lost productivity.
@Telstra is there some sort of issue with the cable service in 2089? Even after a restart of the modem it is still incredibly slow.
@wrongwaygoback could be worse, you could have one or both of them in your bed.
@Top8Games here you go, this might make you feel better. https://t.co/mr47iVVzMV
@Marshall_LR @blisterguy @BBCNews oh Marshall, just when I think I've gotten him to give it a rest, you go and poke the damned bear. Sigh.
@Marshall_LR @blisterguy if you were really sadistic, you could feed him Reese's and watch him hurl.
@blisterguy @Marshall_LR i will think of something USA food based Ray detests, keep it in mind & let you know for his next visit Marshall.
@wrongwaygoback looks amazing! Ours ended up with vegemite on wholemeal saladas or a "sandwich" as she calls it.
Not really sure where I am supposed to sleep... Especially while demon cat is protecting hisâ€¦ https://t.co/BIU3eOzgvR
Well, I suppose if you are going to deface a for sale sign, you might as well do somethingâ€¦ https://t.co/0KJ5ZnR4nr
@wrongwaygoback @blisterguy she never wants you to put her to bed. You are in the clear.
@wrongwaygoback holy crap, is that normal? Poor little guy.
@blisterguy child's room. Stat.
@Top8Games what would Macgyver do?
@blisterguy @wrongwaygoback @MtACast buddy, at the rate you are going, your daughter will be exploiting you.
@amandathegreat good help is so hard to find these days.

Making the most of the Sunday morning sunshine. https://t.co/Yd9CAyt2NC

@blisterguy @JechtMurray @timswheelbarrow something you need to share with me Raymond?
@Top8Games AQ and I love that Din Tai Fung, while Ray usually goes for Snag Stand hot dogs and chili fries. Food on 5 is the greatest.
I somehow feel like I am being watched... #sylvaniancreepers https://t.co/Cgl4tIJXKC
@blisterguy @wrongwaygoback @GabySpartz told you it's the worst of humanity. Like Trump on his period.
When your husband won't let you get the 3 year old a puppy. Natural progression is of course toâ€¦ https://t.co/tPoKG0mjjM
@blisterguy @MTGRich @Marshall_LR no you don't. Flogging a dead horse on that one Walkinshaw. Time out for you.
@blisterguy @Marshall_LR I know. You are a terrible teacher.
@Marshall_LR @blisterguy poor Marshall you'll be scarred for life after your first veg experience.
@Top8Games oh it's also about a 15 minute cab ride from where you are staying
@Top8Games she was tiny and quiet and I need a caffe
@Top8Games Five Dock and Wareemba the next suburbs over and our old locale where the Nonnas used to stop me to look at the Bambina when
@Top8Games to Haberfield and try Napoli in Bocca. There is also Papas across the road where you can get a cannoli that will knock your
@Top8Games Jump in a cab to Leichhardt, Moretti is good there or if you want old school Italian with the grocers and the Nonnas try a cab
@Top8Games Dammit BBM! Especially since we are having ribs & burgers for dinner. Shame not here longer we could take you to little Italy.
@Top8Games also have to be better than that snack of tiny teddies that were shared with you.
@Top8Games I'll bet. Very jealous, much better than the sushi I had. Please tell me you tried the duck or pork belly?
@Top8Games how many courses did you brave from their lunch menu?
@blisterguy @efropoker *merivale. Try Ms Gs if you can make it over to Potts Point. Funky little bar and great food.
@blisterguy @Top8Games given the day we've had she can be on the plane home with him.
@blisterguy @wrongwaygoback @Chosler88 use those colloquialisms again Walkinshaw & you just knight find yourself back in NZ
@blisterguy that's your dinner?
@blisterguy seriously?!?
@Marshall_LR wait until the football on Saturday night & the Good Food and Wine Festival next weekend and they will quadruple.
@Marshall_LR @amandathegreat you're staying out in the boondocks aren't you? The only thing out there are corroboree frogs, ibis & pigeons.
@amandathegreat thankfully this guy is in my sisters bathroom, otherwise Ray and AQ would be petrified.
@amandathegreat @Marshall_LR you mean like this guy? Larry won't eat much. https://t.co/GT88KCTydE
@KillGoldfish @blisterguy to be fair you aren't Australian. #boatperson
It's morning like this one that I'm reminded that we live in a pretty amazing part of the world. https://t.co/PVNYfDzZhR
@blisterguy @wizards_magic we can send you back if you would like?
@amandathegreat without sounding completely hippie, have you tried probiotics?
@amandathegreat do you bake? I have a few gf sweet recipes I have perfected over the years
@Top8Games you may need to learn the art of the Archie slap or the throat punch for situations such as these.
@blisterguy https://t.co/QyKuIi1XIv Might be interesting for the visitors
The only good thing about Election Day is the sausage sizzle and cake stall. Also seeing theâ€¦ https://t.co/BNm37d9MDI
@amandathegreat our avg in summer is over 105F. All relative though & the poor little guy is wearing a fur coat. Needs air in his gills.
@amandathegreat cat pancake! Having a heatwave there?
@wrongwaygoback I'm a millennial and could not agree more. The finger pointing is out of control. Hatred breeds hatred.
Oh Britain, you glorious fool, what have you done! Like a house of cards the mighty fall #brexit
@blisterguy ok good, it's your turn for my little pony marathons. There had better be a ghiradelli stash in the suitcase or don't come home!
@blisterguy @lsv good luck lsv, you will be great! And don't worry, they bounce.
@blisterguy you've been replaced. Apparently she's the daddy now. The gangs all here. https://t.co/BoJMzFUmEq
@blisterguy p.s. When you land in LA it will be 1 am-ish. There was a toy sale, ponies & talking Chewbacca. Don't check the account. ðŸ˜˜
@blisterguy @wrongwaygoback oh good it looks like there was no poor bugger between you. You could have taken the tiny terrorist.
@blisterguy @maro254 still think if Bernie has a chance they should change the title from President to Colonel.
@wrongwaygoback with or without you and the tribe?
@Telstra will do. Extra feedback: the system is flawed & needs serious overhaul. It should not be this hard. Especially not in this age.
@Telstra @blisterguy *facepalm*. I tried. They didn't help or understand. Which is why i ended up here. But sure, will do.
@blisterguy @Telstra it's ok, I'm sure a complaint through to ACCC can't hurt either.
@blisterguy @Telstra and were also told there would be extra data in the package.
@Telstra no he did not email or SMS. Your webmail is not working so can't check that.
@Telstra spoke to someone in Philippines an hour ago. Didn't get as far as a ref. #. Thanks for fobbing to another area. Classic Telstra.
@Telstra that was not advised and has never been charged in the 14 yrs I've been a customer except when moving house.
@Telstra those guys really need some customer service training. Maybe try asking the team over @aglenergy they are doing something right.
@Telstra also not happy I was without service Thurs/Fri last week which meant no productivity/limited work. Tried resolving through call cen
@Telstra an activation fee for changing from dsl to cable and only 200gb of data & was told I would get 400gb.
@Telstra thinking i should start billing you for the wasted time I have spent this month due to your inadequate service.
@Telstra have wasted yet another 15 minutes trying to resolve overcharges on my bill and issues with your service. Very frustrating.
@wrongwaygoback @blisterguy didn't he tell you? I'm sending the 3 year old to keep you company.
@Telstra @blisterguy please give me another answer besides tether your phone with the crazy data charges.
@Telstra @blisterguy Its beyond ridiculous now. I have to work from home for the next 2 days. How do you suggest I do that with no internet?
